attributes.action: Why remainers, business, or MPs. Should NOT go against the Will of The People?
attributes.additional_details:
THE QUESTION WAS: Stay or Leave, "Deal or No Deal". Take our Country back and trade as the 5th Biggest Economy, WORLDWIDE!
  
It's an affront to our Democracy that the 'losing side' or politicians should suggest ANOTHER ‘Peoples Vote’ when we've had “THE PEOPLE’S VOTE”. Or businesses with an interest in staying in the Euro Club are seeking to undermine our electorate.

IF YOU BELIEVE A SOVEREIGN BRITAIN WILL PROSPER. SIGN TO TELL EUROPE THE UK VOTE IS SACROSANCT AND CAN “NEVER” BE CHALLENGED!!.
attributes.background:
In 2017 the UK had a democratic vote to stay, or leave the EU and Great Britain delivered a decisive result. 

Yet 2 years later, the side "WHO LOST" are seeking to undermine us. Suggesting the British electorate are simpleton’s, or an uneducated people who do not understand. - A Simple Question!
